TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ResizeMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether a window can be resized and, if so, how it can be resized. Used by the <xref:System.Windows.Window.ResizeMode%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.ResizeMode CanMinimize = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A window can only be minimized and restored. The **Minimize** and **Maximize** buttons are both shown, but only the **Minimize** button is enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.ResizeMode CanResize = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A window can be resized. The **Minimize** and **Maximize** buttons are both shown and enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.ResizeMode CanResizeWithGrip = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A window can be resized. The **Minimize** and **Maximize** buttons are both shown and enabled. A resize grip appears in the bottom-right corner of the window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.ResizeMode NoResize = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A window cannot be resized. The **Minimize** and **Maximize** buttons are not displayed in the title bar.
